data.text: @thedogispog1 We appreciate the information and thanks for letting us know. I'll send the information to the proper team to verify the root of this inquiry. ^Arnez

@SamsungSupport possible known bug, but the way your response software replies on twitter splits threads instead of replying to them. maybe it doesn't know which post in the thread to reply to? no idea without seeing the source
@SamsungSupport ok! whenever they're free they can contact about this

@thedogispog1 Hello. Welcome back to our Samsung social media support. I'll be happy to assist you. This information is offered through a third party. We kindly suggest you wait for the proper developer for assistance with your inquiry. ^Arnez
is this an intentional change of the app, or something on the weather channel's end?
